## Tile.addUserTextElement() method

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> use \[\[addTextElement\]\].
> 

Adds a developer-defined \[\[TextElement\]\] to this `Tile`<!-- -->. The \[\[TextElement\]\] is always visible, if it's in the map's currently visible area.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addUserTextElement(textElement: TextElement): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  textElement | [TextElement](./harp-mapview.textelement.md) | The Text element to add. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
